20101209070201.000|20101209070203.000|CCO|CONFIRMED THAT THE HANDGUN THAT 
20101209070203.000|20101209070205.000|CCO|HAROLD SMITH USED TO KILL 
20101209070205.000|20101209070207.000|CCO|HIMSELF LAST WEEK IS TIED TO

20101209070209.000|20101209070211.000|CCO|>> THE FIREARM USED TO COMMIT 
20101209070211.000|20101209070213.500|CCO|SUICIDE IN HAROLD SMITH IS THE 
20101209070213.500|20101209070216.000|CCO|SAME THAT KILLED RONNI CHASEN.

20101209070218.500|20101209070221.000|CCO|TRANSIENT, HAD A RAP SHEET OF 
20101209070221.000|20101209070222.667|CCO|ROBBERY AND DRUG CRIMES.
20101209070222.667|20101209070224.333|CCO|HE SHOT HIMSELF IN THE LOBBY OF 
20101209070224.333|20101209070226.000|CCO|A SEEDY HOTEL.
20101209070226.000|20101209070227.667|CCO|THEY SAY THAT SMITH WAS THE 
20101209070227.667|20101209070229.333|CCO|LIKELY SHOOTER AND THAT HE 
20101209070229.333|20101209070231.000|CCO|ACTED ALONE.

20101209070243.000|20101209070245.000|CCO|BAD.

20101209070251.000|20101209070253.000|CCO|THE NIGHT HE COMMITTED SUICIDE.
